page.title: 04School Trips.
page.content: One of the most enjoyable events in our school calendar is the school { trip. Each year we draw up a list of places to visit and we usually end up visiting a Wild Life park. There are so many wonderful animals to see and so much to do that we never seem to get tired of these visits. On most of these trips our mothers join us and they seem to enjoy them as much as we do. During the 'eighties' we have visited the{West Midland's Safari Park, Margam {Abbey Park, Tenby Wild Life Park,}and this year we visited {Penscynnor Wild {Life Park.}Each place has its own speciality.{West Midland's }with its monkey enclosure,{Margam}with its deer and{Tenby }with its birds of prey. I am already looking forward to next year's trip. (Group C.) P.B.
